title: Bug 12646Switching working sets should preserved expanded state
description: From Nick's working set UI testing notes:" We should try to preserve the expanded state when switching working sets.E.g. if I have a CU selected in project P, if I switch to a working set showingjust P, the CU should still be visible and selected.Any folders which were expanded under P should still be expanded as well.Use AbstractTreeViewer.get/setExpandedElements()."
